bio: Award-winning designer & UX guy. UX Design Manager @ SAP, Co-Founder @ Founder2be.com. Former VP of Design @ Market Logic, Sr UX PM @ Nokia & @ HERE, Director of UX @ Strands. Berufskolleg Technik des Kreises Siegen-Wittgenstein Media Design for Digital- and Print-Media Market Logic Software VP Design Founder2be Co-Founder & Chief Design Officer Nokia Senior UX Project Manager Nokia Senior Visual & UX Designer Strands Director of Design and User Experience Strands Mobile Designer Mediatwister Founder & Creative Director Absolute Media Designer and Developer of Print- and Non-Print Media autoTRADER.ca Principal UX & Visual Designer SAP UX Design Manager
